mapper.insert: INSERT INTO THEATER_RES (thrCODE, mID, thCODE, thrCNT, thrORDERDATE, thrREVIEW, thrTOTPRICE, thrDATE) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||#{thcode}||THRCODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{thcode}, #{thrcnt}, SYSDATE, 0, #{thrtotprice}, #{thrdate})
mapper.select: SELECT thrCODE FROM THEATER_RES WHERE mID = #{mid} AND thCODE = #{thcode} AND thrDATE = #{thrdate}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THEATER_RES WHERE mID = #{mid} AND thCODE = #{thcode} AND thrDATE = #{thrdate}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THEATER_RES WHERE mID = #{mid}
SELECT SEATCODE FROM THEATER_RES TR, THEATER_SEAT TS WHERE TR.THRCODE = TS.THRCODE AND TR.THRCODE = #{thrcode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THEATER_RES WHERE thrCODE = #{thrcode} AND TO_CHAR(thrDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
